content: मगधः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country, the southern part of Behar; अस्ति मगधेषु पुष्पपुरी नाम नगरी <ls>Dk. 1</ls>; अगाधसत्त्वो मगधप्रतिष्ठः <ls>R. 6. 21.</ls> {@--2@} A bard, minstrel. --धाः (<ab>pl.</ab>) The people of Magadha, the Magadhas. --धा {@--1@} The town of the Magadhas. {@--2@} Long pepper.

मगध The country of the Magadhas or south Behar. Its old capital was गिरिव्रज (or राजगृह) which consisted of five hills विपुलगिरि, रत्नागिरि, उदयगिरि, शोणगिरि, and वैभार- (or व्याहार-) गिरि. Its next capital was Pātaliputra <ab>q. v.</ab> Magadha was also called कीकट in later literature.
